K

King - Class in engine.forPiece
The King class represents a king chess piece.

Constructs a new King instance with the given alliance, piece position, and castling capabilities.

Constructs a new King instance with the given alliance, piece position, first move status, castling status, and castling capabilities.

KingSafetyAnalyzer - Class in engine.forPlayer.forAI
The `KingSafetyAnalyzer` class is responsible for analyzing the safety of the king during a chess game.
KingSafetyAnalyzer() - Constructor for class engine.forPlayer.forAI.KingSafetyAnalyzer
Private constructor to prevent instantiation of `KingSafetyAnalyzer`.
KingSafetyAnalyzer.KingDistance - Class in engine.forPlayer.forAI
The `KingDistance` class represents the distance between the player's king and the closest enemy piece.
kingSideCastleCapable - Variable in class engine.forPiece.King
A boolean indicating if the king is capable of performing king-side castling.
KingSideCastleMove(Board, Piece, int, Rook, int, int) - Constructor for class engine.forBoard.Move.KingSideCastleMove
Constructs a `KingSideCastleMove` instance with the provided board, moving piece, destination coordinate, castle rook, and rook start and destination positions.
kingThreat(Move) - Static method in enum class engine.forBoard.BoardUtils
Checks if making a specific move puts the king in threat.
kingThreats(Player, int) - Static method in class engine.forPlayer.forAI.StandardBoardEvaluator
Calculate the score based on king threats for the specified player.
